video.title: Legit
video.synopsis: Comic Jim Jefferies plays a version of himself, a fun-loving, irresponsible stand-up sensation whose mother constantly plots to get him to go legit.

episodes.synopsis: While registering to become a legal alien of the US, Australian comedian Jim Jefferies complains to his roommate Steve his desire to go "legit" -- lead a normal life, find a woman, have a child... and, ideally with the woman dying and leaving the child to him.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: While Jim is smoking pot at a park, a woman walking her dog asks him to watch her pet while she runs home briefly, and he promptly loses the dog.
episodes.title: Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Billy tells Jim and Steve he wants to have a relationship with a woman, so Jim sets him up on an Internet dating site.
episodes.title: Love

episodes.synopsis: Jim argues with his girlfriend, Peggy. After she storms off, Jim becomes concerned that he can't keep his anger in.
episodes.title: Anger

episodes.synopsis: In a series of flashbacks from a day in court, we see how a couple of thugs staked out Steve and Jim's place after they assume they're dealing drugs.
episodes.title: Justice

episodes.synopsis: Ramona asks Steve to speak at Career Day at her nephew's high school, where the bored students make fun of him.
episodes.title: Family

episodes.synopsis: Jim goes to an audition and is asked to take his shirt off. As soon as they see his chest, they tell him they aren't interested.
episodes.title: Health

episodes.synopsis: Steve stops by his mom's home to pick up some things. While Jim and Billy wait, Billy's dad reveals he's not allowed in the house and lives in a tent.
episodes.title: Hoarders

episodes.synopsis: After a gig, Jim begins flirting with Jenny, a local radio celebrity. They get drunk together and she ends up sleeping with him.
episodes.title: Bag Lady

episodes.synopsis: At Billy's adult care facility, Jim becomes interested in getting a date with a nurse named Allie so he volunteers to work.
episodes.title: Cuckoo's Nest

episodes.synopsis: Jim drives everyone to a baseball game, where he explains that he only puts his baseball hat on at the start of the game.
episodes.title: Hat Hair

episodes.synopsis: At an audition, Jim flirts with Carla and hits it off with her so much that she offers to give him a ride home.
episodes.title: Misunderstood

episodes.synopsis: Wanda, the prostitute that Jim and Steve took Billy to in Las Vegas, shows up at their doorstep -- pregnant and claiming it's Billy's baby.
episodes.title: Fatherhood

episodes.synopsis: After his pornography addiction comes to light during a live radio broadcast, Jim confronts the issue at home.
episodes.title: Loveline

episodes.synopsis: Struggling to accept Billy's mortality, Jim copes by trying to seduce the sister of a recently deceased muscular dystrophy patient.
episodes.title: Death

episodes.synopsis: Jim finds his dream girl but soon discovers that she's a racist. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang gets into hot water at a bar.
episodes.title: Racist

episodes.synopsis: Memories of the good old days prove to be faulty when Jim and Steve go to their high school reunion, where Billy poses as an able-bodied alumnus.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Billy gets towed away in the van, and Jim and Steve leap into action when gangbangers steal Billy's wheelchair.
episodes.title: Checkmate

episodes.synopsis: The guys' fathers take them on an outing to a water park, where they are joined by some prostitutes they met at a massage parlor.
episodes.title: Rub 'N' Slide

episodes.synopsis: Needing to get away from his parents, Jim goes with Steve to entertain the troops in Afghanistan, where they soon come under heavy fire.
episodes.title: Afghanistan

episodes.synopsis: After he walks in on Billy having sex, Walter pulls a disappearing act. While they try to hunt him down, the guys uncover a secret about Janice.
episodes.title: Homeless

episodes.synopsis: Jim takes a turn on Hollywood's notorious casting couch to get a movie-industry bigwig to land him some roles.
episodes.title: Licked

episodes.synopsis: When news about his ex-wife launches Steve into a drunken binge, Jim must take care of Steve's visiting daughter for the weekend.
episodes.title: Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Walter and Janice hold an intervention to help Steve quit drinking. Meanwhile, Jim hosts a cocaine-fueled party in his bedroom.
episodes.title: Intervention

episodes.synopsis: When he stops drinking to help Steve with his sobriety, Jim suffers panic attacks. Later, he winds up at a costume party hosted by an old flame.
episodes.title: Sober

episodes.synopsis: After being shot by a heckler, Jim ponders putting an end to his comedy career. Meanwhile, Billy attends a video game tournament.
episodes.title: Honesty
